page.title: 06MINING, PARK MILL, 5
page.content: { DAY AND AFTERNOON SHIFTS} CUT COAL,MAKE ROADWAYS, PROP ROOF WITH GIRDERS ETC. {NIGHT SHIFT} STARTS AT 10.30 P.M. THEY CHECK AND REPAIR MACHINERY AND PREPARE FOR NEXT SHIFT { {WORK ROTA}- ONE WEEK ON DAY SHIFT, ONE WEEK ON AFTERNOON SHIFT, THEN BACK ON DAY SHIFT, ONE WEEK ON NIGHTS EVERY 6 WEEKS. WE USE {DRIFTS} AT PARK MILL. THESE ARE SLOPING TUNNELS FROM SURFACE DOWN TO COAL LEVEL. THEY ARE USED TO TAKE MACHINERY IN AND BRING COAL OUT OF MINE. MEN USE A VERTICAL SHAFT 80 METRES DEEP AND ARE LOWERED BY CAGE. COAL FACE IS ABOUT 3 KILOMETRES AWAY. TO GET THERE MEN WALK, RIDE ON THE { {PADDY}(MINIATURE TRAIN) AND RIDE ON A CONVEYOR BELT. IT TAKES ABOUT 45 MINUTES. OUT OF 7.25 HR SHIFT, 1.5 HRS TRAVELLING. ONLY 12 YEARS WORK LEFT AT PARK MILL,BEST SEAMS HAVE BEEN WORKED.
